name: Chikoku-! Chikoku-!
description:
This is an endless run game.

I am a Japanese who started studying game production on May 1, 2019.
I made this game in a week.
This is my first game, so there are many shortcomings, but I did my best.

I am working on a new game, so if you are interested, please follow my twitter :D

https://twitter.com/orihara_crow (ENG Account. *Maybe my English is strange.)

https://twitter.com/orihara_kurou(JP Account)
